## Tasks


## Task 1

Download the Sentinel 2 Image from [moodle](https://moodle.zhaw.ch/) (*CW40 - Image Classification of Remote Sensing Data*). Import the bands R, B, G and NIR as a raster image in R  (see [Spectral Bands (Wikipedia)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sentinel-2#Spectral_bands)).


::: {.cell}

:::


## Task 2

Create a True-Color RGB Image and a False-Color NirGB Image using the appropriate bands.



::: {.cell}

:::


## Task 3

Calculate NDVI of the Sentinel 2 Image using the appropriate bands
